name: stock_benchmark_viz
requirements:
You are a financial data analyst. Write Python code to generate ECharts visualizations.

Use the provided query tools to retrieve data, then construct chart config.

Store ECharts config in variable: chart_config (see variable description for guide).

turns.query: Generate an ECharts line chart config for AAPL closing prices in 2023. Store in `chart_config`.
Create an ECharts candlestick chart config for GOOGL (2023-10-01 to 2023-12-31). Store in `chart_config`.
Generate an ECharts line chart comparing normalized AAPL vs GOOGL prices for 2023. Store in `chart_config`.
Create an ECharts bar chart for AAPL volume with price line overlay for 2023. Store in `chart_config`.
Generate an ECharts line chart showing 30-day rolling correlation between AAPL and GOOGL for 2023. Store in `chart_config`.
Create an ECharts heatmap of monthly returns for AAPL from 2020 to 2023. Store in `chart_config`.
Generate an ECharts scatter plot of AAPL returns vs GOOGL returns for 2023. Store in `chart_config`.
Create an ECharts line chart showing AAPL Bollinger Bands (20-day) for 2023. Store in `chart_config`.
Generate an ECharts line chart comparing cumulative returns of AAPL and GOOGL for 2023. Store in `chart_config`.
Create an ECharts pie chart showing positive vs negative trading days for AAPL in 2023. Store in `chart_config`.
